Module com.calendarfx.app
Package com.serenitask.controller

Class SettingsController

java.lang.Object
com.serenitask.controller.SettingsController
public class SettingsController extends Object
Provides a user interface component for managing application settings. This class is responsible for rendering a settings dialog where users can view and modify application settings. Settings are persisted to the database automatically.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private static final Boolean
    enableLiveUpdates
    Flag to enable or disable live updates to the database when settings change.
    private static final Map<String,javafx.scene.control.Control>
    settingControls
    Map of setting titles to their corresponding UI controls.
    private static final SettingsDAO
    settingsDAO
    Data Access Object for interacting with the 'settings' table in the database.

  • Method Details

    • addSetting

      public static void addSetting(String title, String type, String defaultValue, javafx.scene.layout.VBox parent)
      Adds a setting to the settings UI and handles database interaction.
      Parameters:
      title - The display title of the setting.
      type - The data type of the setting ("text", "number", "time", "boolean", "choice").
      defaultValue - The default value of the setting (as a String).
      parent - The parent container to add the setting UI element to.

    • createInputControl

      private static javafx.scene.control.Control createInputControl(String type, String settingValue, String title)
      Creates and configures the appropriate UI control based on the setting type.
      Parameters:
      type - The type of setting, determining the UI control to create.
      settingValue - The initial value to set for the UI control.
      title - The title of the setting, used for identifying the control.
      Returns:
      The created and configured UI control.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the setting type is invalid.

    • getSettingValue

      public static String getSettingValue(String title)
      Retrieves the value of a setting from the UI control.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the setting to retrieve the value for.
      Returns:
      The current value of the setting, or null if the setting is not found.

    • saveSettings

      public static void saveSettings()
      Manually saves the settings to the database.

    • createTimeComboBox

      private static javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<String> createTimeComboBox(String defaultTime)
      Creates a ComboBox pre-populated with time options in 15-minute intervals.
      Parameters:
      defaultTime - The default time to select in the ComboBox (format: "HH:mm").
      Returns:
      A ComboBox containing time options.
